name: Dungeon Defenders II - Bag Booster Pack
detailed_description:
Dungeon Defenders II - Bag Booster Pack
Increase the maximum size of your Inventory and snag some extra goodies with the Bag Booster Pack! This pack contains:

An Additional Bag Slot and An Additional Bag to increase your maximum Inventory size.

Five Campaign Shard Packs to gear up your heroes faster.

Two Hero Slots to create additional heroes in your deck.

“Baggins” Title to embrace your inner pack rat.

600 Gems to purchase Heroes, Tower Skins, Costumes and more.

short_description: Increase the maximum size of your Inventory and snag some extra goodies with the Bag Booster Pack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
